definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: Kramer was the Commandant of the Bergen-Belsen concentration camp.
sentences.chinese: 克萊默是卑爾根貝爾森集中營的指揮官。

sentences.english: Oradell is a borough in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States.
sentences.chinese: 奧拉德爾是美國新澤西州卑爾根縣中的小鎮。

sentences.english: The next day, the Norwegian made it to Bergen.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，挪威人也到了卑爾根。

sentences.english: Foxes on spitsbergen are saprophagous animals in winter .
sentences.chinese: 斯匹卑爾根羣島上的狐狸，冬天是食腐的動物。

sentences.english: A Norwegian lorry driver was transporting a load of penguins to the aquarium in Bergen.
sentences.chinese: 一個挪威卡車司機運一車廂企鵝到卑爾根的水族館。
